narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Greater Lakes Mental Health Foundation INC is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility  Mental Illness provider based in Lakewood, WA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $56.0M in Medicaid payments across 702K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $56.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
